tweet.text: For another “classic in the annals of Soviet chutzpah,” this next #FavoriteFRUS describes the Soviet response to U.S. Embassy Moscow’s detection of listening devices in a connecting tunnel. 🕵️‍♀️ Summer 1978 was not dull in U.S.-Soviet relations: https://t.co/RDqBFZ1t8i https://t.co/mVKwHuYMKQ
